attributes.action: Make only quiet fireworks available for sale to the general public.
attributes.additional_details:
Please, follow the web link provided below, to review background information, evidence and references:

http://nyti.ms/296Mgxm
attributes.background: Only allow softer firework celebrations, it will reduce stress for noise-sensitive children, veterans, older people, pets and wildlife. The aforementioned compromise, will still allow firework lovers to enjoy firework displays, but without causing acute auditory stress and emotional upset to others.
